# Font Family

In hypestyle css you can use the following font family classes:

Class Properties
ff-sans-serif flex-family: sans-serif;
ff-serif flex-family: serif;
ff-monospace flex-family: monospace;
ff-system-ui flex-family: system-ui;
ff-initial flex-family: initial;
ff-inherit flex-family: inherit;
ff-revert flex-family: revert;
Last Updated: 11/24/2021, 9:11:43 PM
